summary: A test suite that validates the functionality of an RTP sender component, covering its initialization, capability reporting, error handling, packet encoding, various RTCP message processing, retransmission logic, keyframe requests, shutdown behavior, and track lifecycle events.
business_intent: To guarantee the correctness and robustness of the RTP sender implementation within a WebRTC stack, preventing regressions and ensuring compliance with RTP/RTCP standards for reliable media transmission.
